Header.name: Geisiel Melo
Header.description: Building exceptional digital experiences is my specialty as a developer.

paragraph.p1: I’m someone driven by challenges and committed to delivering the best results in the shortest time possible. For me, it’s not just about creating something functional; I strive to go further, combining attractive design, intuitive usability, and flawless performance — both in the interface and the code.
paragraph.p2: Currently, I work as a web developer at UniFTC, specializing in accessibility and performance. In recent months, I’ve been deeply involved in building websites, APIs, and integrations, ensuring that every project runs smoothly and provides users with a seamless and exceptional experience.
paragraph.p3: My journey began by developing solutions for self-employed professionals and small business owners. That period was transformative, allowing me to explore various technologies and understand the unique needs of each client, shaping the way I approach projects today.
paragraph.p4: In my free time, I enjoy recharging by playing games with friends or diving into great TV shows.
